scripts.dev: bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/frontend' dev & bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/backend' dev
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.compile: bun run build:frontend && bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/backend' compile
scripts.lint: bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/frontend' lint && bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/backend' lint
scripts.test: bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/frontend' test && bun run --filter '@kubeairunway/backend' test
